display_long_description:
# Welcome to Novalight!

Novalight is a free-to-play, hand-based movement multiplayer game that takes place thousands of years into the future where humans have gone extinct after a failed experiment caused the earth to explode.

[media]

# Choose Your Own Path:

Join up to **20 players** in a public server or create a private one with friends!

Play through either the **Story Mode, Gamemodes** or perhaps just hangout & chat with friends in the lobby.

[media]

# Customization:

You can customize your character with a wide variety of cosmetics!

and may purchase them with **Nebulite** in the store!
there are many customization options in this game so you'll be able to create a great outfit and show it off to others!

You may also select the option of either being a **"NovaCat or NovaBunny"**

[media]

# Download Today!
Are you ready to embark on your adventure?

[media]

# Welcome to Novalight!

Novalight is a free-to-play, hand-based movement multiplayer game that takes place thousands of years into the future where humans have gone extinct after a failed experiment caused the earth to explode.

# Choose Your Own Path:

Join up to **20 players** in a public server or create a private one with friends!

Play through either the **Story Mode, Gamemodes** or perhaps just hangout & chat with friends in the lobby.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499622919_2244974469340881_5111832590388467202_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5z8Bst09BfEQ7kNvwHMxxH2&_nc_oc=AdnAsplm7BDA63UCkWwYz_NV8Mmfs25TaJ4dxsEdg16nV-1dTl5K7j81XZ9MWlMCwv4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqT5Lsvz3kJHQzr9xMWt4hKh2TOVMs_b_t8DwLkDdkjMQ&oe=697F5766)

# Customization:

You can customize your character with a wide variety of cosmetics!

and may purchase them with **Nebulite** in the store!
there are many customization options in this game so you'll be able to create a great outfit and show it off to others!

You may also select the option of either being a **"NovaCat or NovaBunny"**
